BriefDescription: PPC Instructions Finished by this thread when all threads in the core had the run-latch set
Cycles in which the NTC instruction is not allowed to complete because any of the 4 threads in the same core suffered a flush, which blocks completion
Completion stall due to a long latency scalar fixed point instruction (division, square root)
Finish stall due to a scalar fixed point or CR instruction in the execution pipeline. These instructions get routed to the ALU, ALU2, and DIV pipes
Duration in cycles to reload from another chip's L4 on the same Node or Group ( Remote) due to a marked load
Completion stall by Dcache miss which resolved in L2/L3
Finish stall because the NTF instruction was a load that missed in the L1 and the LMQ was unable to accept this load miss request because it was full
The processor's Instruction cache was reloaded either shared or modified data from another core's L2/L3 on the same chip due to an instruction fetch (not prefetch)
Finish stall because the NTF instruction was a load instruction with all its dependencies satisfied just going through the LSU pipe to finish
The processor's Instruction cache was reloaded from another chip's L4 on the same Node or Group ( Remote) due to an instruction fetch (not prefetch)
The processor's Instruction cache was reloaded with Shared (S) data from another chip's L2 or L3 on the same Node or Group (Remote), as this chip due to an instruction fetch (not prefetch)
Threshold counter exceeded a value of 128
Number of Branch Mispredicts

A Page Table Entry was loaded into the TLB from local core's L2 hit without dispatch conflicts on Mepf state. due to a marked data side request. When using Radix Page Translation, this count excludes PDE reloads. Only PTE reloads are included
Threshold counter exceed a count of 4096

A Page Table Entry was loaded into the TLB from another chip's memory on the same Node or Group ( Remote) due to a marked data side request. When using Radix Page Translation, this count excludes PDE reloads. Only PTE reloads are included
Completion stall due to cache miss that resolves in the L2 or L3 with a conflict
Finish stall because the NTF instruction was a load that hit on an older store and it was waiting for store data
Marked dtlb miss
The processor's Instruction cache was reloaded with Modified (M) data from another chip's L2 or L3 on the same Node or Group (Remote), as this chip due to an instruction fetch (not prefetch)
Finish stall because the NTF instruction was a larx waiting to be satisfied
